Description:
Responsibilities:Lead the technical design and development of complex software solutions.
Mentor and guide junior developers, fostering a collaborative and high-performance team environment.
Take ownership of full-stack development, from architecture design to implementation and deployment.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers and designers, to translate business requirements into technical solutions.
Evaluate and recommend technologies, frameworks, and tools to ensure the highest quality and efficiency in development projects.
Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues, providing innovative solutions.
Stay updated with industry best practices and emerging technologies, and apply them to enhance development processes.
Contribute to code reviews and enforce coding standards to maintain code quality.Job Details
